artist: Artist: Scott Cunningham; Author: Mumia Abu-Jamal , et al.; Editor: Sandy Jimenez , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and reproduction of a painting of a fat white man with a prison cell inside a bomb for a belly; 96 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #21
